name: Bloatblossom
senses: keensense 60 ft. (can't sense beyond this radius)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bloatblossom makes one Bite attack and one Slam attack, or it makes two Toxic Nodule attacks. If the Bite and Slam attacks both hit one Humanoid, the target must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or be infected with apocalyptic fungus (see sidebar).

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13).

actions.name: Toxic Nodule
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 12 (2d8+3) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The bloatblossom's Perception is 16 while perceiving by hearing.

special_abilities.name: Plant Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The bloatblossom is resistant to exhaustion and to the paralyzed, petrified, and unconscious conditions.
